docs.lead_paragraph: NEW drugs are the key to the market performance of pharmaceutical stocks, as investors in SmithKline and Schering-Plough can attest. headline.main: Market Place; Impact of News On Drug Stocks

docs.abstract: Robert Metz article on drug stocks observes that SmithKline and Schering-Plough Corps have found that success or failure of new drugs to be key factors in performance of pharmaceutical shares (M)
